basics.name: Cuong Nguyen Chi
basics.label: Full Stack Web Developer
basics.summary: An ambitious and self-motivated web developer with a considerable technical skill who possesses self- discipline and ability to work with minimum of supervision. Able to play a key role in website development to ensure maximum accessibility, user experience and usability. A quick learner who can absorb new ideas and can communicate clearly and effectively.

work.name: Prime Commerce
work.summary: Technology company in E-commerce and Communication industry
highlights: Build core business and template for E-commerce website
Build web SSO and user management for Prime's ecosystem

work.name: FPT Information System
highlights: Build and deploy robotic process automation solutions to automate complex banking operations (UiPath)
Build a business management software system and group software approval process based on Camunda Platform
Implement workflow groupware with BPMN, Camunda
Build a system of authentication and user authorization
Deploy and operate the system with Kubernetes with HA architecture
Deploy and operate UiPath system with HA architecture on Window Server and CentOS
Automate the product release process with Jenkins
Package applications with Docker

work.name: VDAT Lab
highlights: Build a form builder system, support users to create online surveys and analyze survey data based on JSON Schema and Angular framework
Build a webapp to support the hospital to collect the glycemic index of diabetic patients using Angular Framework and Bootstrap.
Build a portal and information exchange support system in the hospital using Angular Framework, NestJS, WebSocket
Deploy and operate the system with Kubernetes with HA architecture
Automate the product release process with CI/CD (Gitlab CI)

projects.name: Doora Music
highlights: Search & play music from Youtube
Create room listen to music together
Allow user invite member from url
Allow user add song to queue of room
Allow user choose member of room play music
Using MinIO (like AWS S3) to storage media
Crawler data from Youtube

projects.name: IOH Chat
projects.description: Information portal and support system for information exchange in hospitals
highlights: Design and develop web application with Angular and Ant Design
Develop Restful APIs, WebSocket with NestJS, PostgreSQL
Build application with Gitlab CI, Docker
Deploy Kubernetes system with HA architecture
Learned OAuth2 makes it easy for me to decentralize users and protect internal services (Keycloak)

projects.name: IOH
highlights: Build a webapp to support the hospital to collect the glycemic index of diabetic patients using Angular Framework and Bootstrap.

projects.name: IOH Form Builder
